amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute prohibits Members from receiving advances on royalty income, requires prior approval of any contract providing royalty income, however it does not prohibit Members from receiving royalty income.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to prohibit Members of Congress from receiving advances on book royalties, but exempt royalties earned from book sales from restrictions on outside income.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Solomon.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 174, 2 Present (Roll no. 882).
